contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox settlement |name = Wateringen |subdivision_type = [[List of sovereign states|Country]] |subdivision_name = [[Netherlands]] |subdivision_type1 = Province |subdivision_name1 = [[South Holland]] |subdivision_type2 = Municipality |subdivision_name2 =[[Westland (municipality)|Westland]] |image_skyline = Wateringen entree.jpg |area_total_km2 = 8.9 |population = |population_as_of = |density = |website = |image_coat_of_arms = |image_map = LocatieWestland.png |map_caption = |image_map1 = Map NL - Westland - Wateringen.png |map_caption1 = The village (dark green) and the statistical district (light green) of Wateringen in the municipality of Westland. |latd = 52 |latm = 1 |latNS = N |longd = 4 |longm = 16 |longEW = E |coordinates_type = type:city(13880) |coordinates_display= title }} '''Wateringen''' is a town in the [[Netherlands|Dutch]] province of [[South Holland]]. It is a part of the municipality of [[Westland, municipality of the Netherlands|Westland]], and lies about 5 km southwest of [[The Hague]]. Until 2004 it was a separate municipality and covered an area of 8.93 kmÂ². The former municipality of Wateringen also included the town [[Kwintsheul]]. The village of "Wateringen" has a population of around 10,860.<ref name="CBS2">Statistics Netherlands (CBS), [http://statline.cbs.nl/ ''Statline: Kerncijfers wijken en buurten 2003-2005'']. As of 1 January 2005.</ref> The statistical area "Wateringen", which also can include the surrounding countryside, has a population of around 13,880.<ref name="CBS2"/> [[Image:Wateringen 1868.png|thumb|none|225px|Wateringen in 1865.]] == Gallery == <gallery> Image:Wateringen, molen de Windlust foto2 2009-09-27 12.43.JPG|windmill: molen de Windlust Image:Wateringen, straatzicht met kerk1 2009-09-27 12.47.JPG|church in the street Image:Wateringen, Sint Jan de Doperkerk foto2 2009-09-27 12.55.JPG|church: Sint Jan de Doperkerk </gallery> ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * [http://www.gemeentewestland.nl/ Municipality of Westland] (in Dutch) [[Category:Populated places in South Holland]] [[Category:Former municipalities of South Holland]] {{SouthHolland-geo-stub}}
